moves.name: Thunder Fang
moves.description: The user bites with electrified fangs. It may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

moves.name: Ice Fang
moves.description: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. It may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.

moves.name: Fire Fang
moves.description: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. It may also make the target flinch or leave it burned.

moves.name: Bite
moves.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.

moves.name: Poison Sting
moves.description: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Knock Off
moves.description: The user slaps down the target's held item, preventing that item from being used in the battle.

moves.name: Knock Off
moves.description: The user slaps down the target's held item, preventing that item from being used in the battle.

moves.name: Pin Missile
moves.description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Acupressure
moves.description: The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its stats.

moves.name: Pursuit
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a target that is switching out of battle.

moves.name: Bug Bite
moves.description: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

moves.name: Poison Fang
moves.description: The user bites the target with toxic fangs. It may also leave the target badly poisoned.

moves.name: Venoshock
moves.description: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. Its power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

moves.name: Hone Claws
moves.description: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy.

moves.name: Toxic Spikes
moves.description: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the opponent's feet. They poison opponents that switch into battle.

moves.name: Night Slash
moves.description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Scary Face
moves.description: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly reduce its Speed stat.

moves.name: Crunch
moves.description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Fell Stinger
moves.description: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Attack stat rises sharply.

moves.name: Cross Poison
moves.description: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also leave the target poisoned. Critical hits land more easily.
